title: We’ve Played Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.30.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Roger joins Greg for his first KFGD! They chat about Roger's time with Avatar, Bungie layoffs, and a new Nintendo patent.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:50 - Housekeeping
We’re hosting the SILENT HILL Ascension live premiere pre-show at 4:30 pm PT on Halloween! We’ll talk to the Genvid team behind the interactive streaming series, find out how you’ll shape the canon of SILENT HILL, and countdown the seconds until you can experience the terror tomorrow!
Over on Patreon:
We have a new Remember Blank up where Tim and Bless reminisce about all of their favorite Mario memories.
A new Shit List is live where Bless and Tim break down the top ten Mario spin-off games.
The Roper Report   -
00:11:18 - There Appears to be Layoffs at Bungie
00:13:48 - Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora Preview Round Up
00:24:39 - Nintendo reportedly patented a dual-screen gaming device ‘that can split in two’
00:29:33 - Microsoft has started blocking ‘unauthorized’ Xbox controllers and accessories
00:36:41 - Ad
00:37:47 - FromSoftware Recruitment Drive Suggests Major Expansion
00:44:17 - Five Nights at Freddy’s has an incredible Box Office debut
00:49:06 - Out Today
00:52:15 - “Any speculation as to why Remedy chose to withhold Xbox review codes for the game?” - The Hash Slinging Slasher
00:54:23 - Squad Up: Joe Mertens - American Democracy
00:57:00 - You‘re Wrong
01:01:27 - The Post Show!
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Bless
